p: The presence of organosulfur constituents like allicin (major active constituent), ajoene, S-allyl- l-cysteine, diallyl disulfides (DADS), methyl thiosulfonate and diallyl trisulfides etc. are responsible for these pharmacological activities. Allium Sativum can be utilized in diversevarietiessuch as raw,dried powder, aqueous extract, oil and aged garlic extract(AGE) form. Mata analysis interpretation confirmed that AGE produces a dependable lowering of blood pressure (both SBP and DBP) compared to other forms of A. Sativum [ 33].
